text: thumb|90px|Coat of arms Lanzo d'Intelvi was a comune in the Province of Como in the Lombardy region in Italy. On 1 January 2017, the former municipalities of Lanzo d'Intelvi, Pellio Intelvi and Ramponio Verna merged to form the new municipality of Alta Valle Intelvi. == References == Category:Former municipalities of Como
title: Lanzo d'Intelvi
